short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View Your AdLinks Data in Facebook Ads Manager

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will take your AdLinks data and place it inside Facebook Ads Manager. You will then be able to see Facebook's original data side by side with your AdLinks data.
